alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alexander, west central Ballard, northwestern Mississippi and central Scott Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Benton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Horseshoe Lake Conservation Area, Olive Branch and Mound City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 4. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 1 and 6, and between Mile Markers 18 and 21. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 66 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southern Illinois...western Kentucky...and southeastern Missouri.
